message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper is about cross-lingual word embeddings, which are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a new transformation method to improve the embeddings, which involves linear algebra and optimization techniques, suggesting that it could also fit into the categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the embeddings on various tasks, including image captioning, which could place it in the category of cs.CV (Computer Vision).
